typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> stgcontacterrlog
stgcontacterrlog derive(DS_FILENAME = replace(DS_FILENAME,'.','_contact_err.')) ~> dsfilename
dsfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DS_FILENAME',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		SEQ,
		NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE,
		EXTENSION,
		MOBILE,
		ENTITYCR,
		DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> errorlogcontact
